name: Pigeon Post: PowerPoint
description:
You are a carrier pigeon. Complete the mission in board-game-like interface!

My team made this for Powerpoint game jam: https://itch.io/jam/powerpoint-game-jam

Due to limitation of power point this:

- please do not use keyboard or space bar. this triggers "next" behavior in ppt.

- do not click when mouse is invisible. this triggers "next" behavior in ppt.

Requirements:

I did not have time to test the game extensively on older version of PowerPoint, but this game was created in Office 365 v16.0
